model.name: Long-Sleeved Regular Shirt With Placed Graphic
model.disambiguatingDescription: This versatile long-sleeved shirt in the SS23 collection’s refined blue-grey tones works with both casual and more formal ensembles. A contrasting screen-printed LV signature on the left chest pocket gives it a subtle contemporary twist. This piece can be worn with matching cargo pants for a modern utility look.

additionalProperty.name: detailedDescription
additionalProperty.value:
• 100% Cotton
  • Metal Grey
  • Regular Fit
  • Model wears a FR M size
  • Model measurements : chest 33.5’’ / 85 cm, height 6'3’’ / 190 cm
  • Made in Italy
